ooC: If no part of the Maxi base took damage, they Lynxiz was 
slightly exposed to the Infecticon cannon. (or something like that) 
Heh, I wanted to post something... =P

-- Lynxiz --

A soft growling worms its way up through some rubble outside the 
Maximal base. A dusty wreckage covered bot coughs. The bot thinks to 
herself, <Where are you Lynxiz?...> Her optics pick up trace amounts 
of light filtering towards her. She clenches her fist, then starts to 
wiggle her way into a more convenient position.

Noticing that she's half covered by a sheet of armour, she grabs the 
edges and comences to push the plate upward, till her legs are free. 
Rising to her feet, still holding up the plate, Lynxiz forces it 
upward, till any debris still covering her had slid of the plate. She 
moves backward a bit, drops the plate, and leaps forward into a roll 
to avoid any other hazards.

After regaining her sense, she opens a commlink to Prowl. "Commander 
Prowl, Lynxiz reporting. I was buried outside... I think that i took 
some of the blast."
